DOC.brief_title: A Study NeoRecormon ( Epoetin Beta ) Patients With End Stage Renal Disease .
DOC.criteria: adult patient , 1875 year age ; endstage renal disease ; renal dialysis > = 3 month ; receive NeoRecormon treatment > = 3 month ; Hb stable < 105g/L , LVMI > 160g/m2 . unstable hypertension , myocardial infarction , unstable angina pectoris risk deep vein thrombosis last 6 month ; use ESA NeoRecormon ; acute infection ; use iv NeoRecormon .
